definition: conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: The company boasts a lot of awards it received at international fairs.
sentences.chinese: 該公司在國際性會展上一舉攬獲數項大獎。

sentences.english: Attend pre-meeting planning meetings or conferences as needed or requested.
sentences.chinese: 根據要求和需求參加會展前計劃會議。

sentences.english: Which big, creative event agency would you like to work with?
sentences.chinese: 你最希望進入到哪一個大型創意會展公司工作？

sentences.english: The meeting and exhibition economy grows at 30% rate per year in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國每年以30%增長的會展經濟創造了新的財富。

sentences.english: With the rapid development of convention and exhibition industry and the increasing passenger flow, Pazhou international CE center has become the second in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在會展行業迅速發展的背景下，會展客流量急劇膨脹。

sentences.english: With the rapid development of convention and exhibition industry and the increasing passenger flow, Pazhou international CE center has become the second in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在會展行業迅速發展的背景下，會展客流量急劇膨脹。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the development of tea exhibition in China and summarizes the developing stages.
sentences.chinese: 分析了我國茶業會展的發展現狀，歸納了其發展階段。

sentences.english: Women"s dignities are all about their faces."
sentences.chinese: 當我感到不快，所有的表情都會展現在臉上。

sentences.english: How to constructs specialized person-raise pattern of multi-skill innovation talented.
sentences.chinese: 如何構建會展專業的複合型創新人才培養模式。
上海洪音會展服務有限公司。

sentences.english: Chong Heng Exhibition Co. , Ltd. located in Guangzhou Baiyun District, Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 廣州創恆會展有限公司位於廣州市白雲區。

sentences.english: Exhibition Road in South Kensington was redeveloped in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 南肯辛頓的會展路於2011年重新開發。

sentences.english: Nan'an district service outsourcing of creative industries like convention and exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 南岸區重點發展會展等創意產業服務外包。

sentences.english: The Leisure Thematic Exhibition Hall is located in the White Horse Lake Convention & Exhibition Center.
sentences.chinese: 主題館選址位於濱江區的白馬湖生態創意城會展中心。

sentences.english: I went to a trade show this week in Stuttgart.
sentences.chinese: 這星期我到斯圖加特參加了一個貿易會展。

sentences.english: The exhibition projects, including ICEF, have the general characters of project management.
sentences.chinese: 包括ICEF在內會展項目也具有項目的一般特點。
